item.title: It's On Fire! ðŸ”¥
item.description: The first thing is to decompile the apk to inspect the application files. Since this is a Flare-On challenge, attempt to search for [flare-on.com](http://flare-on.com) shows up in the strings.xml : Where is this string used in the code? private final String d(Context context) { String slice; String string = context.getString(R.string.c2); Intrinsics.checkNotNullExpressionValue(string, "context.getString(R.string.c2)"); String string2 = context.getString(R.string.w1); Intrinsics.checkNotNullExpressionValue(string2, "context.getString(R.string.w1)"); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); sb.append(string.subSequence(4, 10)); sb.append(string2.subSequence(2, 5)); String sb2 = sb.
